My name is Matt Mills. I spit hot photos.

Booze Cruise Meets BROQUEST

Or at least one of the members of BROQUEST was there. All in all, a fun night. I keep hearing that other people are doing booze cruise on saturdays now, if that's true could someone tell me? Chris? I just want to drink and ride bikes with people, and who cares what night it's on, right?

Anyway, between last week's illness, starting the new job, and all the things I was doing over the weekend, I've been neglecting all the backend stuff- editing, organizing, and blogging. It's tiring, and the list of things I need to get done tomorrow is a mile and a half long. May or may not do all/some of it.









Posted by Matt on 2009-08-11 00:00:00 -0500

Another Norman Saturday Night

I felt kinda really off shooting saturday, ended up dancing as much as photographing. That's what I get for eating a whole hot n ready sausage pizza.

This girl had everything I look for in a woman: 1. a camera 2. madness 3. the tendency to flip shit and run off.

Cameron, also late of BROQUEST, although he finished in a different place.

This was a complete accident. I like it.

This was completely on purpose. I like it as well.



The morning after... It's funny how few pictures I have of scenes like this, when it happens to me all the time. Expect that to change in the weeks to come.
Posted by Matt on 2009-08-11 00:00:00 -0500

Technical difficulties...

For those of you paying attention, there has been a little hiatus, a delay, a mini vacation even... Partly because of work, and the interruption to my sleep schedule, but also partly because it seems like I pick up every little bug that comes along since my accident. I felt like death for 48 hours, and I still have something of a sore throat, but I think I'm going to be all right.



These pics are from Monday; Lori texted me from work, asking me to get people up there, so I did; Christa and Jonathan came out and had drinks. It's sort of a hellish job, working in a karaoke bar; I hope Lori gets something else soon.



Anyway, I like my new job so far. It's actually challenging to steam milk. I still don't really have a grasp of what I'm really doing, but that will come in time.



And for those of you that have read this far down, a surprise: Booze cruise is happening this Friday, 9pm. The plan is to do two rounds at each bar, so we can keep some kind of momentum. Starting at the rooster, have a couple pitchers, then to the drunken fry, because I really want to try that truffle shit, and then to nancy's, so we can all get banned from yet another karaoke bar. I'm going to be annoying everyone in my phone/twitter followers about this too for the next couple days, hopefully enough people come out.

Outtakes...

These didn't really fit with the rest of the pictures I took last night, but I Like them anyway, and I think at least some people will like 'em. next post in 5...4...





Posted by Matt on 2009-08-02 00:00:00 -0500

ISO 25,000

So this is crazy, really wild, I mean, talk about no light, some of these are taken in the reflected mirror ball light off a black wall, just insanely no light at all, but here are the pictures. This is going to be fun. I'm playing around at ISO 25k, which is just unheard of, it's so noisy it's an extra level of abstraction. Focus is "guess and get lucky sometimes," other times it's just blurry and that doesn't really hurt things because these pictures aren't about detail but about energy and tone and exploring places that heretofore were invisible to the camera, and a lot of times to the eye. These are places people go but not places that are easily seen unless you go there, at least until now. Enough ramble. The photos!
